attributes.action: Ban Horses from being ridden on the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1) they get in the way so much
2)they have bridleways where cars can't go, so why do they insist on creating unnecessary traffic on the roads.
3)surely the horse does not appreciate cars being driven by it constantly, and would much rarther be jogging round the fields, instead of being some spoilt girls plaything.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
